member.summary: Used to send communication through SendGrid's HTTP API.

member.name: P:Rock.Communication.Transport.SendGridHttp.CanTrackOpens
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether transport has ability to track recipients opening the communication. Mailgun automatically trackes opens, clicks, and unsubscribes. Use this to override domain setting.
member.value: true if transport can track opens; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Rock.Communication.Transport.SendGridHttp.SendEmail(Rock.Communication.RockEmailMessage)
member.summary: Send the implementation specific email. This class will call this method and pass the post processed data in a rock email message which can then be used to send the implementation specific message.
